data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NKbsGMw2m_AQ7kNvgGg6Q8d&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDxyAT4r_JsjmrugVRFBe4yRVfXXqZ8g4iZlfpnus9Q0A&oe=6638BD37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=knbC-nqEQfAQ7kNvgEl0kMv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfDKwq4vH9rj_QRtM3H7Mv7hfwW42p2XIU-oqw-iNWAwLg&oe=6638CAD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SQtH2de2cR8Q7kNvgHfujRA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfD1kFDo3aJktfZ7P0pSEJVP6txST5T1Eln75lDadHAogQ&oe=6638CE50)
